desc: We are a local Market business based just outside Alexandra - offering home deliveries to Wanaka , Alexandra, Cromwell & surrounding areas. Fresh Seasonal Food & Produce. Fresh, Vegetables, Fruit, Meat, Bread, Gourmet Pies and Sweet treats, Cheeses, Deli Products, Whole Milk in Bottles, Free Range Eggs & more

layout.text:
Our own Saffron Threads are now available for you to order online -
Order online by Tuesday 11pm for Delivery on Thursday - Click & Collect available from Wednesday to Saturday.
Taste Central Otago Food Produce Shop Hours:
Tuesday to Friday: 11am till 5pm
Saturday: 11am till 3pm
Closed: Sunday & Monday's
